en: and He [it is who] guides me.
And it is He who feeds me
it is He who cures me
And who will cause me to die
and then bring me to life

ar: وَٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لِى خَطِيٓـَٔتِى
en: And who I aspire that He will forgive me my sin
[And he said], "My Lord, grant me authority
and join me with the righteous.
